name: Fix Savage2
description: This style makes changes to Playsavage2 (www.playsavage2.com) and the Savage2 Forums (forums.savage2.com). I wrote it to fix the layout issues caused by adding a Donate-O-Meter to PlaySavage2, but it can also fix some other things that I found annoying.
additional_info:
v1.0
02/22

Removed the Donate-O-Meter.
Adjusted the page layout appropriately.

v1.1
02/23

Photo albums didn't like this. Fixed.

v1.2
03/13

Removed the div that spammed the forum with "These users thanked you for" bleh...
Removed group discussion spam from PlaySavage2.
Removed video spam from PlaySavage2.

v1.3
03/13

Removed group wall spam from PlaySavage2.

v1.4
06/11/12

Updated Userstyles page.
Provided options. Some of them are new.
Changed pictures.

v1.5
06/11/12

Fixed layering. Donate button works again.

V1.6
2013 June 07

- Anti-Maxfighter measures now include hiding photo posts from the main feed.
- Added option to do nothing to the Donate-O-Meter considering that we currently don't have one.

style_setting_options.label: A: Hide the Donate-O-Meter on the front page.
B: Move the Donate-O-Meter on the front page.
C: Do nothing to the Donate-O-Meter.
style_setting_options.value: /* Option 1C: Do nothing to the Donate-O-Meter. */

style_setting_options.label: A: Apply anti-Maxfighter measures
A: Hide the div where the thanking happens.
B: Don't hide the div where the thanking happens.
style_setting_options.value: /* Option 3B: Don't hide the div where the thanking happens. */
